sentence.Network_en: I shut the door noiselessly behind me.
The piston slides noiselessly up and down.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个活塞上下活动,没有响声.

sentence.Network_en: When she was frightened she darted noiselessly like a kingfisher.
sentence.Network_cn: 她受惊的时候,就像一只一声不响地急投疾枪的翠鸟.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... noiseless 无声的 noiselessly 无声地 noisy 吵闹的.
以n开头的英语英文单词 ... noiseless 无声的,寂静的 noiselessly 静静地，轻轻地 noisily 喧闹地.
说一不二 English,... ... 一声不吭 to not say a word 一声不响 noiselessly;to keep totally silent 一式二份 in duplicate.
The sea noiselessly up the shore ., 海水悄无声息地上海岸.

list.abs: the mechanism of noiselessly cutting valuable quarry stones ., 贵重石材荒料无声切割机理.
run infallibly 必然地逃走run noiselessly 悄悄地跑run obediently 驯服地操作
The door slid open almost noiselessly ., 门几乎无声无息的滑开.
The sea noiselessly up the shore ., 海水悄无声息地上海岸.

entry.def: Something or someone that is noiseless does not make any sound.

example.ex: The snow was light and noiseless as it floated down.
example.tran: 雪花轻盈飘落，无声无息。

sentences.sentence: "he stood up soundlessly and speechlessly and glided across the hallway and through a door"

auth_sentence.content: She bent her knees and plucked it noiselessly from the belt.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: She bent her knees and plucked it noiselessly from the belt.

auth_sentence.content: He went out to listen, leaning over the bannister and sliding noiselessly down, a few steps at a time.
